name: refined-mapy.cz
description: Refines Mapy.cz interface and adds useful features
author: Pavel 'Strajk' Dolecek <strajk@me.com> (https://www.strajk.me/)

meta.name: Refined Mapy.cz

gpx-drop.title: Drop GPX file on a map to show as blue overlay
gpx-drop.description: This will allow you to plan a new route while seeing the GPX overlay. Compared to the native GPX import which will get lost when you interact with planner

map-condensed.title: Condensed Map interface
map-condensed.description: Redundant controls hidden, the rest made more compact and unified. Hidden hefty text descriptions. Hidden paid Points of interest.

sidebar-condensed.title: Condensed Sidebar interface
sidebar-condensed.description: Reduced size of lot of elements to fit more content, especially saved routes.

performance.title: Performance improvements
performance.description: Disabled some unnecessary slow animations, which were nice at first, but get annoying after a while.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Keyboard shortcuts for fast map type switching (<kbd>Q</kbd> Basic, <kbd>W</kbd> Outdoor, <kbd>E</kbd> Aerial, <kbd>R</kbd> Geographic. <kbd>P</kbd> toggle Pano, <kbd>O</kbd> toggle 3D).

meta.descriptionDetailed:
‚Ä¢ Keyboard shortcuts for switching map types
‚Ä¢ Condensed sidebar to fit more content
‚Ä¢ Condensed map controls
‚Ä¢ Hidden paid POIs

scripts.prep-for-publish: rm -rf build build.zip && webpack --mode=production && cd build && zip -r ../build.zip ./ && echo 'Jobe done üôè'
